title: Cartoon Games - Sound Effects
description: Alot of high quality cartoon sound effects for your game! :D
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This pack contains over 100 cartoon sounds for your game! These sounds are widely used in various scenarios, such as jumping, opening a chest, movement, user interface, and many others, even if your game is not directly cartoon-style.


It's good to remember that I named them according to the visual reference when I created them, however, I'm sure they serve many other scenarios and animations.


The sounds were designed to sound actions in a way that keeps the game fun and immersive for the player, at the same time, I'm sure these sounds will come in handy at some point in its development :)


By investing in this package you take all that and still encourages me to continue creating quality sound effects at a great price! :D


Check the preview

Check the documentation

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
